title.rendered: Pineapple Air Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Pineapple Air is an airline based in Nassau, Bahamas. The airline operates scheduled flights within The Bahamas (Nassau, North Eleuthera, Governor’s Harbour, Rocksound, Crooked Island, Acklins, Deadman’s Cay, Stella Maris).

Pineapple Air was founded in 1999 by K. Michael Carey, CEO and president. The company commenced operations in 2000 with a 15-seat Beechcraft C99 aircraft. It has since added slightly larger Beechcraft 1900 and Embraer 110 Bandeirante aircraft to its fleet. It has only had one incident which was involving an Embraer 110 Bandeirante in which the aircraft had a landing gear collapse at 8:00 pm Jan 9th 2018 at an airport in Eleuthera only one passenger had minor injuries and the plane sustained only minor damages

Verified & Updated on: 30/06/21

Pineapple Air Address, Phone, Email, Working hours

Address :The Nassau International Airport
P.O. Box SS- 5603
Nassau, Bahamas

Phone: (242) 328-1329

Ticket Office

Phone: (242) 328-1329, (242) 323-2420, (242) 225-1044

Fax: (242) 334-2999

North Eleuthera
Tel: (242) 335-2081

Vibe: (242) 334-2999

Governor’s Harbour
Tel: (242) 332-3811

Vibe: (242) 225-0767

Rock Sound
Tel: (242) 334-3000

Vibe: (242) 225-4631

Email: info@pineappleair.com

Fax: (242) 702-7251

Pineapple Air Official website: https://pineappleair.com/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Pineapple Air 

  • Embraer 110
  • Beechcraft 1900
  • Short 360-300

Pineapple Air Baggage Allowance

Pineapple Air Baggage Allowance

View Pineapple Air Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by Pineapple Air Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Pineapple Air Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Pineapple Air : (click on the stars below)
